simplifySchedule.title: Simplifies Schedule Adjustments
simplifySchedule.description: Handle last-minute changes due to early dismissals, special events, or weather delays with ease. Generate abbreviated schedules that automatically adjust class durations while preserving key events like lunch and electives.

rotatingSchedules.title: Keeps Rotating Schedules on Track
rotatingSchedules.description: Manage A/B or multi-day rotation schedules effortlessly. iSchedulEDU recalculates schedules instantly, ensuring you always know what day it is and which classes to prepare for—without relying on paper calendars.

reliableSharing.title: Reliable Schedule Sharing
reliableSharing.description: Communicate schedule changes quickly via QR code or text. Keep substitute teachers, students, and colleagues in sync effortlessly.

smartAlerts.title: Smart Transition Alerts
smartAlerts.description: Built-in alerts for class and event end times mean no more clock-watching. Choose which events need an alarm for smooth transitions without unnecessary interruptions.

visualOverview.title: Clear Visual Overview
visualOverview.description: See your full day at a glance with our 12 AM–12 AM time grid. Visualize and adjust schedules easily with a complete view of your day at your fingertips.

flexibility.title: Flexibility Without Complexity
flexibility.description: Managing schedule changes shouldn't be difficult. iSchedulEDU gives you complete control:
bullets: Assign custom schedules to specific days with simple toggles
Set up recurring schedule alerts for weekly routines
Customize alarms for each event based on importance
